name: officiousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having too high an opinion of your own importance, and being too eager to tell people what to do: She didn't have any of the irritating officiousness that occasionally accompanies people in high positions. The referees are running this tournament with a minimum of officiousness. See
officious
More examplesFewer examplesShe plays the lawyer with great officiousness.They displayed a frustrating mix of officiousness and incompetence.I became angry at their officiousness.
